# Microfeedback

**Tag:** `cui-microfeedback`  
**Category:** components  
**Source:** https://coherence-ftekb0dcfpcjb3gv.b02.azurefd.net/resources/microfeedback/

## Import

```js
import '@charm-ux/cui/dist/components/microfeedback/index.js'
```


> Microfeedback

## Guidance

### Standards

- You must meet the following requirements when using this component.

### Anatomy

- Thumbs up/down
- Quick menu
- Offensive/Inappropriate option (required for AI generated content)
- Feedback dialog
- Dialog name
- Feedback questions
- Text input
- Character counter – optional
- Helper text – optional
- Legal disclaimer
- Buttons to submit or cancel

### Use the default set of feedback options for AI experiences

- These options will help you collect consistent qualitative feedback that can be compared across AI chat experiences.

### Provide a confirmation

- After feedback is submitted let the user know by displaying a “Thanks for your feedback.” message.

### Set limits with character counter

- Limit verbatim feedback with a character counter. The default character counter allows users to enter up to 500 characters.

### Microfeedback is displayed on AI generated content

- Copilot’s response includes the microfeedback thumbs up/down entry point.

### Thumbs up selected

- Default AI feedback options are displayed in a quick menu.

### Additional feedback dialog

- If user opts to provide additional feedback, a feedback dialog appears.

### Confirmation

- “Thanks for your feedback” is displayed in a response card in the Copilot sidecar experience.

### Provide feedback

- Reach out to us if you spot a bug or have a feature request. Your feedback is critical to the success of Coherence and everyone who uses it.
- Contact us on Teams
